stories.text:
Hey everyone,

I'm a self-taught programmer who used to work at FB for 4 years.

I'm happy to provide free programming interview guidance to anyone that needs help, either in the comments of this post or in a discord that I put together(dan#9955). I'm not offering to solve specific programming questions, I'm offering to provide guidance on what to study and how to prepare!

Discord invite link: https://discord.gg/M8944Xz26m

Feel free to share the link with anyone who would benefit.

## My Story

After 3 consecutive years of Google/FB interviews, I finally received offers from Google, FB & others.

When I was at FB, I conducted a lot of interviews and I even taught a class around programming interviews to my friends! Those friends are now at Google, Amazon, WeWork & smaller tech companies.

I want to help others avoid the mistakes I made and that I'm constantly seeing others make!
